plot: Groundskeeper Willie becomes the coach of the mathletes, Lisa and other kids from Springfield Elementary compete against Waverly Hills Elementary.

Lisa joins a maths quiz team, who fare poorly against rivals who have superior technology. So Springfield goes totally digital, burning paper books . Unfortunately a meltdown means the entire system crashes but using decidedly old-fashioned methods Lisa builds up the quiz team and, with unlikely help from Bart, takes it to victory.—don @ minifie-1

After the Mathlympics Team at Springfield Elementary, with Lisa, their latest member loses, they modernize the school to encourage learning. They then set out to win the Mathlympics, with the help of Groundskeeper Willie and, surprisingly, Bart.—Rishal
